<a id="ImageTexture3D"></a>

# ImageTexture3D

**Inherits:** [Texture3D](Texture3D.md) **\<** [Texture](Texture.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Texture with 3 dimensions.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**ImageTexture3D** is a 3-dimensional [ImageTexture](ImageTexture.md) that has a width, height, and depth. See also [ImageTextureLayered](ImageTextureLayered.md).

3D textures are typically used to store density maps for [FogMaterial](FogMaterial.md), color correction LUTs for [Environment](Environment.md), vector fields for [GPUParticlesAttractorVectorField3D](GPUParticlesAttractorVectorField3D.md) and collision maps for [GPUParticlesCollisionSDF3D](GPUParticlesCollisionSDF3D.md). 3D textures can also be used in custom shaders.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="ImageTexture3D_method_create"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Error](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Error) **create**\ (\ format\: [Format](Image.md#enum_Image_Format), width\: [int](int.md), height\: [int](int.md), depth\: [int](int.md), use_mipmaps\: [bool](bool.md), data\: [Array](Array.md)\[[Image](Image.md)\]\ ) [ðŸ”—](#ImageTexture3D_method_create)

Creates the **ImageTexture3D** with specified `format`, `width`, `height`, and `depth`. If `use_mipmaps` is ``true``, generates mipmaps for the **ImageTexture3D**.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="ImageTexture3D_method_update"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **update**\ (\ data\: [Array](Array.md)\[[Image](Image.md)\]\ ) [ðŸ”—](#ImageTexture3D_method_update)

Replaces the texture's existing data with the layers specified in `data`. The size of `data` must match the parameters that were used for [create()](ImageTexture3D.md#ImageTexture3D_method_create). In other words, the texture cannot be resized or have its format changed by calling [update()](ImageTexture3D.md#ImageTexture3D_method_update).
